content:
, the same kind of argument is also available to
defenders of abortion: Since we are not sure whether the fetus is a person, but
we are sure that the pregnant woman has rights over her body, we should
give the benefit of the doubt to the pregnant woman. We should always sus-
pect that there is something wrong with an argument that can be used equally
well in opposing directions.
CONFLICTINGPRINCIPLES.  A third kind of pro-choice response is to invoke
